name: Posh Boutique 2
summary: After taking over her grandmother's line of fancy clothing stores, Alicia finds out she's won the lottery! With her winnings in hand, Alicia's ready to take her Posh Boutique to the next level. Help Alicia expand her business by assisting each customer in their search for the perfect outfit, adding just the right accessories, and choosing the best upgrades and enhancements for each location.
